name: Five Star Champs-Elysees Hotel
description:
DESCRIPTION
This five star hotel in the centre of romantic Paris offers outstanding facilities, privacy, comfort and gastronomic cuisine, ensuring an unforgettable occasion for you and your guests. This is a perfectly city-chic Parisian wedding & honeymoon hotel.
The hotel can offer a bespoke celebration or tailored packages to ensure your day is just perfect. It is possible to have a wedding breakfast and cocktail reception at the hotel and hire bedrooms independently or you can hire the entire hotel for your exclusive use.
Under its monumental stained glass dome designed by the famed Gustave Eiffel, the restaurant of the Hotel Vernet is devoted to the pleasures of the senses. The kitchen is visibly accessible through a large window, creating discrete and uninterrupted activity. The eye is drawn around the room, attracted by the many original works of art from contemporary artists, as if wondering in a true Parisian collectors’ residence. It is the perfect Parisian location for your wedding breakfast.
For a cocktail reception, the bar offers an atmosphere, which is intimate, and as light as the sparkle of a champagne glass. The materials are noble, such as the virgin white Carrera marble counter, which with it’s rounded edges seems to be floating.
The ceiling is covered with a fresco, painted by internationally celebrated Jean-Michel Aberola, which seems to be reflecting the dynamics of the carpets designed by the same artist.
The spirit of the place is tangible, surprise and seduces the Parisian and International clientele with the utmost sophistication.
Accommodation:
5 star services & amenities
The Hotel revives the tradition of the great Parisian establishments of the chic 8th arrondissement of Paris by offering itself the distinction of a contemporary interior created by Interior designer François Champsaur, who pays tribute to Parisian elegance and French craftsmanship.
All guest rooms include:
Free WIFI | Minibar | In room Pay TV | Flat screen televisions | USB port | Smartphone Jack connection | Safety Deposit box | Air-conditioning |
24 hour room service | Free coffee and tea facility as of Prestige room category | Exclusive in-room hairdresser to the stars, manicure, pedicure, upon request
Prestige Suite
For your wedding night, enjoy a perfect balance of craftsmanship and effortless elegance. The architect François Champsaur reveals a symphony of colours and materials enhancing the feeling of luxury and wellbeing. Some of our suites have their own private terrace. It’s hard to believe you’re in the heart of Paris when you’re relaxing in the Prestige Suite. And with a separate sitting room, there’s plenty of space to entertain or relax before drifting off in your comfortable king bed.
The hotel can accommodate 50 guests for a wedding breakfast and 150 guests for a cocktail reception.
Dinner menus start at 105 euros per person | Alternatively you can rent the entire hotel from 17,000 euros a night which includes 50 rooms and suites for your guests. (Minimum of a 2 night stay).
In-House Wedding Services are available with our on site wedding planner. Services include:
Catering on-site.
Outside alcohol allowed.
Outside alcohol corkage fee.
Outside kosher catering allowed.
Some basic catering service items included.
Wedding cake - Pastry Chef on-site.
Event space floor plans / diagrams provided.
Vendor referrals provided.
Venue space fee: Please inquire for details.
Wedding/Event Planning available on-site.
Florist in-house.
For more information then please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to give you a bespoke quotation.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)

Disabled access
Maid service
Gym Equipment
Recommended wedding planner
Recommended suppliers list available
Recommended caterer

Nearest Airport
All Inclusive Option
